reference.title: Features
reference.shortdesc: An is an enhanced next-generation platform core that has combined capabilities of numerous services.

section.p: The is a Content Management and an action execution engine that applies Access Control List (ACL) and other authorization policies for security.

features are as follows:
Everything in the object store is modeled as an Object.
Author a Content Pack which helps the consumers and providers.
Supports object extension and ACL.
Author the actions in one language and it can be consumed in many other languages.
There is seamless communication between the applications.
Supports various deployment modes.
It is built on a multi-model graph database.
There is a clear separation of storage and computation.
